snippet: The deaths of so many top figures, if confirmed, would be a blow to the affiliate of Al Qaeda, one of the strongest insurgent factions in Syria’s civil war.
abstract: Samir Hijazi, head of Syrian Al Qaeda affiliate Nusra Front, is reported killed along with three other of group's leaders.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Hwaida Saad and Maher Samaan from Beirut, Eric Schmitt from Washington, and Karam Shoumali from Istanbul.

lead_paragraph: The deaths of so many top figures, if confirmed, would be a blow to the affiliate of Al Qaeda, one of the strongest insurgent factions in Syria’s civil war.

headline.main: Deaths Reported in Syria of Top Figures in Group Affiliated With Al Qaeda
headline.print_headline: Deaths Reported in Syria of Top Figures in Group Affiliated With Al Qaeda
